h2_title: Helping Chen Loong Restore the Zodiac Village
content: As a reward, Chen Loong will give you a special scroll to visit the Zodiac Village, where several merchants will now permanently reside, including the Xu Dog. You can now return to him periodically to request free medicine, and he'll give you a handful of random consumables each time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Xu_Dog_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Xu Dog Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Helping Chen Loong Restore the Zodiac Village'.
The content is as follows:
As a reward, Chen Loong will give you a special scroll to visit the Zodiac Village, where several merchants will now permanently reside, including the Xu Dog. You can now return to him periodically to request free medicine, and he'll give you a handful of random consumables each time.
